    All Classes and Interfaces

    Classes
    Class
    Description
    ColourDefinition
    Represents the colour that will be used in the output.
    ColumnDefinition
    Details of column formatting (and header title).
    FontDefinition
    Details of the font to use.
    TableDefinition
    Definition of all formatting to be applied to the table.
    XlsxWriter
    Output an XLSX file one row at a time, streaming the output so that it is written as the rows come in.
